name: Fat Birds Don't Fly
description:
The world's climate changes is affecting how the Ice creatures lives. In a hot day, our Penguin Hero decided to go around and see how he could help with that. He realized that hes going to need alot of gems to build a huge Cooler machine to bring back peace to his biome. Problem is that all animals and stuff are really crazy! Its not going to be an easy task.

Project is in Alpha stage and this demo version should change.
